Star Profile Greece playmaker Georgios Samaras

INTERNATIONAL STATSGAMESGOALSGREECE527GREECE U-21 50EURO 2012 QUALIFYING81PAST INTERNATIONAL FINALS402011-12 CLUB STATSGAMESGOALSCELTIC376Georgios Samaras' slender build betrays the physique of an old-fashioned No.9 - the kind of forward who attacks with his back pushed against the defenders and heads home every cross coming his way
Ukraine 7 Shevchenko 2012 Home Jersey. It is a description worthy of footballing legends such as Ian Rush or Christian Vieri, but not honest enough for the 27-year-old Celtic star's style of play.Gifted with tremendous dribbling ability, Samaras has found himself playing in a variety of positions, from winger to second striker. While at Manchester City, Sven-Goran Eriksson fielded him on the left flank, even though he protested by saying "I am not a left midfielder, I am a striker and I'd like to play there."Eriksson replied that he should become more disciplined in his approach
Spain 5

Carles Puyol 2012 Jersey."I don't think he should be doing so many tricks. He should be using his physical power because he is an extremely good header [of the ball]," the Swede said back in the 2007-08 season.For the Greek national team, former coach Otto Rehhagel didn't hesitate in handing him the role of attacking playmaker and unsurprisingly his goalscoring tally has not been that great. In 52 international caps since 2006, he has scored only seven times and his most memorable moment is not the overhead kick in Greece's comfortable 5-2 victory over Latvia in 2009, but rather his beautiful assist for Dimitris Salpingidis, who netted the winning goal in the World Cup 2010 qualifying playoff against Ukraine.Handling all the playmaking may have been a tough feat, but he served the his country adequately in South Africa despite a first-round exit. Since then, Samaras has since resumed his creative duties for the Euro 2012 qualifying campaign under new coach Fernando Santos
soccer jersey."Gifted with a tremendous dribbling ability, Samaras found himself playing in a variety of positions, from winger to second striker. For the Greek national team, Otto Rehhagel didn't hesitate to give him the role of playmaker"As a youngster, Samaras was equally enamored by basketball - his favorite footballer was Marco van Basten. His sporting hero, however, was Michael Jordan, but he chose football at the age of 10 when he joined OFI Crete, where his father Giannis Samaras - a former Greek international, who currently serves as the head of Panathinaikos' academies - was playing at the time.His prodigious talent attracted the interest of numerous European clubs cheap soccer jerseys. His father, though, an admirer of Dutch football, brought him to Heerenveen in 2001 and a year later his son's efforts bore fruits. While only 17, Georgios broke into the club's first-team scoring three goals in his first four appearances, all as a substitute. He quickly established himself in the Eredivisie and in January 2006 booked his ticket to stardom, when Manchester City bought him for 6 million pounds, a record fee for a Greek player.However, his transfer to the Citizens proved a wrong step in his career as he failed to win a regular place in the starting lineup at Eastlands. A six-month loan spell at Celtic in 2008 provided a welcome boost in Samaras' career
More related news from:www.profanssoccerjersey.com. Scoring a number of important goals in the Scottish side's successful title conquest forced the club to turn his loan deal permanent. Samaras has since won two more trophies with Celtic - the League Cup last season and the Scottish Premier League this term - so he heads to Euro 2012 in the best possible shape.FollowMichael Paterakis on

Andre Villas-Boas turns down Sao Paulo offer

Sao Paulo director Adalberto Baptista has revealed that former Chelsea manager Andre Villas-Boas has turned down the offer to take charge of the club.The Morumbi outfit is currently on the lookout for a new coach following the dismissal of Emerson Leao after growing unhappy with the 62-year-old's work
Italy 2012 kids Soccer kits."[Villas-Boas] said today that he would not accept our offer," Baptista told Globoesporte. "He wanted some time to plan things, and I do not have time to wait."Baptista claims that Villas-Boas was attracted by the possibility of coaching Sao Paulo, but would only take the job if he could begin his tenure in January in order to fine-tune the squad
cheap soccer jerseys."It is hard to sign a foreign coach. By the time he gets things going, the ship has sunk already," he told the Brazilian news outlet. "In Brazil, you have to win the next match
More related news from:www.profanssoccerjersey.com. Now, we are going to war, I am looking for a new coach."Villas-Boas, 34, took charge of Chelsea last summer after guiding Porto to an impressive four-trophy haul, including the Europa League, in 2010-11
soccer Jersey.However, he failed to make his mark at Stamford Bridge and was sacked nine months into his contract after a run of just three victories in 12 Premier League matches.Sao Paulo lies in eighth position in the Brazilian league, with nine points from six matches.Follow GOAL
Mexico nationa team 2011/13 Kids Jersey.COM on

Russian government demands release of locked-up fans

The government of Russia has demanded that the Polish authorities release fans who have been detained following clashes at Euro 2012
More related news from:www.profanssoccerjersey.com.Outbreaks of violence between supporters before Russia's Group A match against the co-hosts resulted in the arrest of 24 Russians, two of whom were immediately expelled from the country.Despite both countries being knocked out of the tournament during the group stage, the conflict has continued off the pitch, with Moscow calling for action on the other 22 fans who have now been detained for 10 days
Real Madrid 2012Away Long Sleeve Jersey. "From the Russian side, strongly underscored was a necessity of solving all the issues for an early return to the motherland of Russian football fans, who were detained in Poland during notorious incidents at the European football championship," said a statement on Russia's Ministry of Foreign Affairs website
cheap soccer jerseys. The statement explained that Deputy Foreign Minister Vladimir Titov and Polish Deputy Foreign Minister Katarzyna Pelczynska-Nalecz had spoken privately about the issue before the demands were issued publically. This was responded to in robust fashion by Pelczynska-Nalecz, who outlined that the arrested Russians would be dealt with according to the laws of his country."Minister Katarzyna Pelczynska-Nalecz responded that in Poland such cases are dealt with and will be dealt with in line with the currently applicable law," said the statement on the Foreign Ministry's website
soccer jersey. Follow GOAL.COM on
menswear

Cruyff Cristiano Ronaldo needs to grow up if Messi chants bo

Barcelona legend Johan Cruyff has told Cristiano Ronaldo he needs to "grow up" if he's affected by opposing fans chanting Lionel Messi's name
Frank Gore Jerseys.Denmark supporters shouted the Barcelona star's name every time that Ronaldo touched the ball during Portugal's 3-2 victory against the Scandinavians at Euro 2012 last week. Cheap jerseys.Cruyff has now declared that the 27-year-old should remain indifferent to what comes from the stands."To Ronaldo, it must be the same if the fans talk about his mother or Messi," he told reporters NFL jerseys."If that concerns him, he needs to grow up

Voronin retires from international football

Andriy Voronin has opted to retire from international football to focus on playing for Dinamo Moscow after Ukraine bowed out of the tournament in the group stages. street fashion."I am leaving the Ukraine team. I took the decision in advance," Voronin told Sport
fashion tips.ua. "I have chosen to focus on a club career because I am not young enough to combine both roles."Voronin has scored eight goals in 78 international appearances for his country

Ndamukong Suh Lions Jerseys.INJURY REPORT OUT: FW Babayele Sodade (R knee ACL tear); FW David Estrada (L foot fracture)DOUBTFUL: GK Michael Gspurning (R hip strain); DF Patrick Ianni (lower back pain); DF Leo Gonzalez (L quad strain); DF Adam Johansson (R hamstring strain); MF Steve Zakuani (R leg fracture)QUESTIONABLE: GK Josh Ford (R knee stress fracture)Sporting Kansas City (4-3-3): Nielsen; Myers, Collin, Olum, Sinovic; Cesar, Zusi, Espinoza; Kamara, Sapong, Bunbury.INJURY REPORTOUT: MF Korede Aiyegbusi (R knee sprain); DF Matt Besler (appendicitis); DF Cyprian Hedrick (L fibula fracture); GK Eric Kronberg (lower back strain); MF Luke Sassano (L knee sprain)DOUBTFUL: FW Bobby Convey (R calf strain); MF Paulo Nagamura (R abductor strain)PROBABLE: FW C.J

Seattle has won five of the six all-time meetings.After a franchise best start to the season, Seattle hasn't won in five games, the most recent a heavy 4-1 loss to open Saputo Stadium in Montreal. "To be frank, it’s embarrassing to lose like that," Zach Scott said.Kansas City rushed through the opening seven games with seven wins. It sits top of the Eastern Conference with 28 points from 13 games
Drew Brees Saints Jerseys. Seattle has 24 from 14, good for fourth in the West.Fredy Montero leads the league with 66 shots and 24 on target. Kei Kamara is second in both categories, having cranked off 54 shots, 23 of which were on target

Ice-cool Neuer prepared for all eventualities ahead of diffi

The Greeks came from nowhere in Group A to book a place in the last eight thanks to a shock victory over Russia in the third group game, and Neuer has praised their never-say-die attitude."I have watched quite a few of their games on television and I have to say that I am particularly impressed by their passion," he told Welt Online."They are very aggressive in their duels and are not only dangerous on the counterattack or with long balls, they are also very good in set piece situations, on which we have to be very careful."With a closely-fought encounter expected, Neuer ran through his preparations ahead of a penalty shoot-out, should Hellas hold out for 120 minutes."I try to make myself as big as possible on the line," Neuer continued
[b]Cheap jerseys[/b]."I concentrate on the penalty taker and pay attention to which foot reacts the quickest to shoot."I watch videos of all their penalty takers before the game and try to memorise how they shoot."The Bayern Munich man took, and scored, one of the club's Champions League final penalties, but suggested he may not step up should any of die Mannschaft's games go the distance."That was a spontaneous decision," he explained. "There are more options to take [a penalty] in the national team. But honestly, I would prefer to win the game before it ever gets to penalties
Article Source:http://www.nfljerseycommunity.com."Greece famously won Euro 2004 as huge underdogs, but the giant keeper is in no mood to help repeat the fairytale."As a goalkeeper I am not a romantic," he said. "I am more pragmatic. "Part of football means that there will be teams who are limited in certain areas more than others. It is normal that they would try to compensate for those limitations and use other strengths.And you have to admit that their tactics are working again in this tournament."And Neuer dismissed claims that Joachim Low's side have become less of an attacking force than they were at the 2010 World Cup, where they scored four goals past Australia, Argentina and England
Brandon Jacobs Giants Jerseys."We are not more defensive," he insisted. "At the World Cup our defence was important too. It's just that nobody noticed it as much."The old saying that attack wins you games and defences wins championships is not true, otherwise Bayern would have been champions last season since we conceded the least amount of goals. The bottom line is that you just have to have the right balance between the two
Josh Freeman Buccaneers Jerseys."Another ex-Schalke keeper, Frank Rost, has recently criticised die Mannschaft for not being convincing enough in their group games, and while Neuer admitted that the team can improve, he stated that outside opinions are not helpful."Everyone is allowed to say what they want, Frank Rost included," he added."A lot of former players have to carve out different careers for themselves after retiring. "Some become experts, but we don't need any expert opinions to tell us if we're good or bad. We know ourselves how we perform.[What's] important is that we won three times.We also know that we can improve."
[b]Cheap NFL jererseys [/b]

Dominik Hasek, at 47, wants a multiyear deal - NHL

For most 47-year-old hockey players, single-year contracts are out of the question. Dominik Hasek, attempting an NHL comeback at that age, doesn't have much interest in that logic
[b]Cheap jerseys[/b]. Hasek, a former Vezina-winning goalie who hasn't played in the NHL since 2008, wants a multiyear contract, agent Ritch Winter told Dave Davis of Kukla's Korner (via Pro Hockey Talk)
Darrelle Revis Jets Jerseys. Dominik Hasek was known for his acrobatic saves—but those came a long time ago
Brandon Jacobs Giants Jerseys. (AP Photo) Winter also said that since the Buffalo Sabres aren't interested in their former star, he's exploring deals with other teams. Hasek was a two-time NHL MVP and won the Vezina six times. His last season as professional was with Spartak Moscow in the KHL during the 2010-11 season
Trent Richardson Browns Jersey. Over the course of 16 NHL seasons, Hasek played for the Chicago Blackhawks, Sabres, Detroit Red Wings and Ottawa Senators. It still seems unbelievable that Hasek has a real chance of returning in any capacity. It'd theoretically happen as a backup, though most teams' goaltending situations are already solidified. The Toronto Maple Leafs are the team most actively seeking a veteran option, but nothing suggests they'd consider Hasek.
More related news from:[b]http://www.nfljerseycommunity.com[/b]

SPAINGROUP C HOW THEY QUALIFIEDPPTSSPAIN824CZECH REPUBLIC813SCOTLAND811LITHUANIA85LIECHTENSTEIN84Spain defender Sergio Ramos believes that Portugal should be regarded as one of the favourites to win Euro 2012.Paulo Bento's side stuttered their way through the qualifiers have been drawn in the tournament's 'Group of Death' alongside three former champions in Germany, Netherlands and Denmark.However, Ramos, who plays alongside Cristiano Ronaldo, Fabio Coentrao and Pepe at Real Madrid, believes that Spain's Iberian neighbours should not be underestimated - in spite of their 0-0 draw with Macedonia at the weekend."One of the favourites for me this year, despite the group they're in, is Portugal," the versatile defender is quoted as saying by his club's official website
More related news from:http://www.soccerjerseysboutique.com/. "They have players of tremendous quality. "I'm lucky to play with some at Real Madrid and I believe they can stand out in the Euros."Ramos' teammate at club and international level, Xabi Alonso, is also wary of the threat posed by the Portuguese and insists that there is not the slightest bit of complacency in the Spanish camp ahead of the big kick-off
football shirt."These Euros will be complicated and, despite what bookies say, I don't see that we're clear favourites," the midfielder argued. "We have to be wary and humble within all this speculation
football kits. It will be tough for Spain."Certainly, Portugal have a great team and it wouldn't surprise me if they went far."Spain have been drawn in the same group as Italy, Republic of Ireland and Croatia.

Falcao Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo comparisons motivate me

France defender Patrice Evra believes that the form of teams in warm-up games ahead of Euro 2012 should not be read into. Les Bleus secured a narrow 3-2 victory over Iceland on Saturday after fighting back from a two-goal deficit. cheap football shirts. "You can play very well in your warm-up games and lose the first match at the Euros. It is June 11 we must be ready for. "We must not be too hard on ourselves."Euro 2012 Remy ruled outEvra appeared culpable for Sigthorsson's goal when he was beaten by winger Rurik Gislason, who crossed for the Ajax striker to finish, but insisted the blame could not be laid on his shoulders
football shirt.Doubts have arisen surrounding the Manchester United full-back holding down a starting berth in the tournament after a disappointing domestic campaign. "When we concede goals, it is down to everyone. We should not single out the defence, the attack or the midfield," he added. Les Bleus face Serbia on Thursday and Estonia next Tuesday before heading to their base camp at Kirsha Training Centre, as they prepare to face England, Sweden and co-hosts Ukraine in Group D.

Cartoon of the Day Europe's giants brought back down to Ear

Saturday saw shock results all over the continent as some of Europe's best and brightest were brought down to Earth by the smaller nations.Netherlands lost 2-1 at home to Bulgaria, Germany were blown away by Switzerland in an extraordinary 5-3, while Cristiano Ronaldo's Portugal could only draw 0-0 with lowly Macedonia. The goal is the Olympic team. We are renovating the team and need young players for 2014,” he told reporters.The Selecao go to North America after the game, with a fixture against the United States on May 30before taking on Mexico and Argentina on June 3 and 9 respectively.The former Corinthians boss has vowed to pick a stronger contingent for those games, and will potentially reintroduce the likes of Neymar to the group."The team in the U.S will be stronger. And for the last two games I have more time to train with the players,” he concluded.Watch Brazil in action ahead of the Olympics when they take on Denmark on Saturday

Fredi Bobic hopes Julian Schieber can stay at Stuttgart

Stuttgart's Julian Schieber may yet stay with the club despite the striker rejecting the offer of a new deal, sporting director Fredi Bobic has hinted.The 23-year-old has one year remaining on his contract and has been heavily linked with a switch to Borussia Dortmund this summer. football shirts."We do not want to sell and we will see what is possible with Julian. We have time

England cannot afford to copy Chelsea's recipe for success

EXCLUSIVEBy James GoldmanFormer England midfielder Steve McManaman believes it would be an error for new Three Lions boss Roy Hodgson to base his Euro 2012 masterplan on Chelsea’s recipe for Champion League success. Don't Miss England fans snub Ukraine this summerMilner believes youngsters can boost England Bet: £5 £10 £20 £50 £100 Returns: England £14.50 Draw £38.00 Belgium £70.00 Bet: £5 £10 £20 £50 £100 Returns: England £15.30 Draw £40.00 Belgium £60.00 Bet: £5 £10 £20 £50 £100 Returns: England £15.33 Draw £40.00 Belgium £65.00 Bet: £5 £10 £20 £50 £100 Returns: England £15.00 Draw £40.00 Belgium £70.00 Bet: £5 £10 £20 £50 £100 Returns: England £15.00 Draw £37
football shirt.00 Belgium £61.00 The Blues conquered Europe a week ago following a dramatic penalty shootout victory over Bayern Munich, but their negative, defensive tactics drew widespread condemnation.Hodgson has packed his England squad with workmanlike midfielders such as Scott Parker, James Milner and Gareth Barry and McManaman hopes that is not a prelude to a summer of dour, unimaginative performances from the Three Lions.He said: “Chelsea did what they had to do to win the Champions League and fair play to them."Particularly in the semi-final it would have been impossible for them to play Barcelona at their own game, but I really hope England don’t go the same way
football shirts.“It’s a tough group England have been drawn in but there’s nothing to be overly scared of. I don’t want to see us pack the midfield and get men behind the ball – it’s just inviting trouble
Arsenal 2011/12 SONG 17 Red/White Home Soccer Jersey.Euro 2012 Lescott hails England unity“We’ve got more than enough creative players in that squad to be able to take the game to our opponents. And with the pace of the likes of Theo Walcott and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain England have got the potential to excite of a lot people in this tournament.“Obviously, if we get through the group stage and face a team like Spain then you’re going to have to be more disciplined and more conservative but certainly in the early stages it would be disappointing if England set out their stall like Chelsea did against Bayern.”England step up their preparations ahead of this summer’s main event with a friendly against Norway on Saturday.Experts and fans do not anticipate the Three Lions will pose a significant threat to tournament favourites Germany and Spain, but McManaman, who represented his country at Euro 96 and Euro 2000, believes the dip in expectation levels will come as a welcome relief to the players
More related news from:http://www.soccerjerseysboutique.com/.“This is the first time we’ve gone into a tournament for a long time without all the usual hype and I’m sure the players will be more relaxed about things,” he added.“I’m sure they’ll still be confident and rightly so because we qualified as comfortably as anybody else.“I think the fact we will be playing France first up is a real bonus. It’s such a massive game for all sorts of reasons and should England play to their potential and get a decent result, the momentum will build."A win would really take the pressure off the manager too and set us up for the rest of the tournament.”Steve McManaman is an ambassador for ESPN Classic, which will broadcast more than 30 hours of footage from past European Championships between Monday 28th May and Thursday 7th June – the day before the start of UEFA Euro 2012. The programming at 8:00pm every weeknight will include hour-long highlights of every final since 1972, as well as other classic games, such as England v Holland from Euro 96

Matri rules out Juventus exit I am not going anywhere

Juventus striker Alessandro Matri insists that he has no plans to leave the Italian giants in the summer
football shirts.The 27-year-old has been linked with a new challenge as the Bianconeri look to add to their squad in order to mount a serious challenge in the Champions League next season.AC Milan is understood to be interested in re-signing Matri, who spent his youth career at San Siro, but the former Cagliari striker is not thinking about leaving the Serie A champions
More related news from:http://www.soccerjerseysboutique.com/."I am not going anywhere, I am staying in black and white," Matri told Sportitalia.Matri, who is contracted to Juventus until 2017, scored 10 league goals in 2011-12

Euro 2012 Preview Ukraine - Sweden

PROBABLE LINEUPSUkraine PyatovHusyev, Khacheridi, Mykhalik, SelinTimoschchuk, Nazarenko, Konoplyanka,YarmolenkoDevic, VoroninSweden IsakssonLustig, Melberg, Olsson, GranqvistElm, Svensson, Kallstrom, LarssonToivonenIbrahimovicUkraine coach Oleg Blokhin has confirmed that the number of his players that were taken ill with food poisoning before the warm-up loss to Turkey have made a full recovery in time to face their Swedish opponents
Soccer News.Anatoliy Tymoshchuk and Andriy Voronin are thus likely to return to the starting lineup, while the Ukraine boss will also make several other changes all over the pitch. Star striker Andriy Shevchenko could be forced to start on the bench as he has struggled to find full fitness of late.Sweden has a clean bill of health after Johan Elmander recovered from a foot injury to take part in training during the week. As such, Erik Hamren will have to make a decision on who to partner big-name striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic with. Ola Toivonen scored and impressed against Serbia in the final warm-up game so expect him to get the nod over Elmander and play just behind the AC Milan forward, with Markus Rosenberg as another option on the bench, meaning the visitor would be unchanged from that 2-1 victory.DID YOU KNOW
